website_summaries.verdict: Easy-to-use meat injector kit that includes all the basics for a low cost. Keep in mind this set is not entirely stainless steel, however.
pros: Includes two needle sizes and a measurement window so you can see the precise amount of marinade added and used
cons: The threads are plastic, as is the measurement window, so they are more prone to damage

customer_reviews.title: Previously Used Rancid Oil?
customer_reviews.text: Got my injector today and opened it up to wash it before use. I noticed that the plunger was kind stuck in the tube and once i pulled it out there was a gummy oil type substance inside the tube and on the plunger that smelled like rancid oil. I tried to wash it out with hot water and dish soap but couldn't get it off or out of the bottom of the tube as the picture shows. Hope this was not a previously used and returned product and then resold to me. :( Not a good outcome here. Requested a refund and returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Dirt bike coolant reservoir mod
customer_reviews.text: Can’t honestly say if this worked as a meat injector, because that’s not what I bought it for. Needed a radiator overflow tank on my DRZ400E, and instead of the old turkey vaster method, I used this nice stainless with sight glass reservoir. Thank you Internet forum for the idea. Product seems pretty well made. Plastic essentially wrapped in stainless. I did try the needles before I took it apart and it looked like it would be a great injector. Might have to order one to actually use it for what it’s intented for.
customer_reviews.author: ScranScran

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: The item came as if it had been used before and/or returned. There was no wrapping on in the inside to indicate this was a new item, and no instructions. Additionally , there was some sort of grease inside of it. I tried to clean it & test it, however; it would not suck up liquid. The seal appeared to be broken and air would get .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Injections are fun!
customer_reviews.text: This does it's job nicely, I've used it a couple of times. I would say that the threads on the end are plastic, so you'll have to be careful and I can see this eventually breaking after several uses and washes, but at $12 you aren't out too much money. The plastic holding case is kind of jank, mine arrived bent a bit and so it doesn't stay snapped closed, I put things on top of it to keep it closed. It's fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Joe G

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to all night brine!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our Thanksgiving turkey. This was something new for me as I usually brine my turkey overnight. I have to say I doubt I'll be brining anymore! This injection pen worked great! I made an easy butter, chicken broth recipe and my husband (who never comes in the kitchen) went to town injecting the bird. Easy, kinda fun and made for a really moist turkey, just as if I brined it all night! Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these items to season a whole pig for roasting on Christmas Eve. It turned out absolutely amazing and let us get flavor into every little nook of the pig. The item comes with two syringes of different thicknesses which let us inject a marinade that had some chunks in it. The item came apart easily to clean and stood up well to the marinade and the sharpness of the needle made it easy for it to go smoothly into the flesh of the meat with no tearing. As if all that weren’t enough, it even came with a case for easy storage of all the items in one place. So happy with this!!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: This product works good and the changeable needles is a must for the ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my first REAL injector. Usually just use the free ones that come with the marinades. This product works good and the changeable needles is a must for the different cuts of meat. Would have given 5 stars only if the " push tube" was completely removable for washing purposes.
customer_reviews.author: MUNDY C

customer_reviews.title: Best injector out there!!!!
customer_reviews.text: For all your meat injection needs, look no further. Great product with 2 different size needles for thick or thin marinades. The stainless body looks great and sight window is easy to read. Comes in a nice storage box to keep everthing together. Would be nice is if the plunger was removable for easier cleaning but thats not really that big of a deal. Overall I would definately recommend this product to anyone else looking for a marinade injector.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Best product!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few products similar to this one but I feel like I finally found the last one I will ever need to buy. I was able to "inject" marinate an 150 lb pig in 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This injector is well built, easy to use, easy to clean, and easy to transport. I primarily use it for injecting meats. Since I live in the city, I generally have to travel to bbq, so it's nice to have a carrying case and not have to worry about the needles getting bent or poking holes. The injector also holds a good bit of juice, so you don't have to fill it up as frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So nice I may order one for myself
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these as a gift for my dad who loves to grill and smoke different meats so he can experiment with new recipes he comes up with. He has had a knack with previously owned injectors to either lose or break the needles when they get shoved in a kitchen drawer. He was thrilled this had a box organizer for storage and is excited to use this for our game day tailgate meals!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel LaMunion

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on schedule, put it to use immediately. Injected a fresh pork shoulder to smoke and make pulled pork. Used the smaller of the two needles because of the thin liquid of apple cider and hard apple cider. Worked with perfection and ease! Can't wait to inject my next protein! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: thomas anthony

customer_reviews.title: Best injector I’ve ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Best injector I’ve ever purchased. Love the storage case and different size injectors. Perfect for injecting marinade into turkey or chicken! Seems like most injectors I’ve bought in the past are really only meant for single use - not this one!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna M.

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect, very easy to use and well made
customer_reviews.text: Used it yesterday for the first time. Worked perfect, very easy to use and well made. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: JoeCool

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only used once so far but It's very easy to work with and feels pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Deane

customer_reviews.title: The Injector Needles are not Stainless Steel but Plastic Chrome Plated-Junk
customer_reviews.text: The product is junk. The needles are plastic not stainless steel. It is made of a plastics product chrome plated. All you need to do is scrape the needles on a sharp turkey bone and it will leave plastic or chrome platting in your food. Junk !!!!!! Also the picture does not show washers that are needed. Again misleading. They only sent 1 washer for 2 needles. All the other products show the washers with the product. JUNK. Amazon needs to correct the description and picture.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Meat marinade Injection Set
customer_reviews.text: This sturdy meat marinade injection kit was just what I was looking for. It is easy to use & won’t break like the plastic one I used before.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: I just got it so can't attest to durability but seems fine so
customer_reviews.text: Well I decided to make lechon asado (Cuban pork) for the first time, and read some different ways to do it; for 10 bucks figured I would get this injector and try that method (also plan to use on my Christmas turkey). My marinade contained about 20 cloves of minced garlic- and this gadget handled it with no issue. Comes apart for the dishwasher. I just got it so can't attest to durability but seems fine so far
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kulp

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the 1st use.
customer_reviews.text: Broke on the first use! This is plastic, with a metal wrap, don’t be fooled by the pictures into thinking it is metal.
customer_reviews.author: WSJ

customer_reviews.title: It does work, but nat as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't pleased with this. I fell I should have purchased the one that cost a more
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Glass

customer_reviews.title: It looks like it should belong in an operating room
customer_reviews.text: Mannnnnnnn I'll telll you whhhattt. Put yer secret sauce in the chamber and let er rip. This baby will blast straight flavor into anything you put in front of it. It looks like it should belong in an operating room, but gets it done on a big ole roast in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: You Saved Thanksgiving!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find one in stores so ordered for next day delivery so I could inject my turkey! Worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: L. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and a good price with prompt shipping I bought 3 of them
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for minced dried herbs.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to inject herb brine etc... Opening for larger needle is not an issue, but opening on the syringe was way too small. Makes no sense. Update... It broke on the 4th usage. The plastic threads on the plunger end gave out and plastic pieces everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Baaabooo

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use.
customer_reviews.text: The part the holds the liquid on mine cracked after using it only one day. I thought with this case I’d get a lot more usage out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: 1 star is kind. Draws virtually nothing with either syringe. Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: 2nd different injector I've used in less than 3 months and apparently it's all cheap Chinese crap. This one started leaking between "glass" or clear see through plastic and the actual metal. If anyone knows a solid injector that's durable, please feel free to share.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go with a metal injector
customer_reviews.text: In comparison to previous injectors I have owned this just does not hold up. The injector does not seal properly so pulls air in from the opposite end. When injecting the fluid leaks out the wrong end. I do not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: William Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Injector for the SmokeMaster
customer_reviews.text: Very durible injectors !!!! We’ve bought serveral ... this by far the best for (6’8 BBQ Master of Pcola)
customer_reviews.author: Go Vikes

customer_reviews.title: Broke first time using
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use this. Mixed up a thin marinade, injected the meat twice, and on my third draw up of the liquid it didn’t draw up. Looked at it closely and noticed a big crack in the clear plastic window on the front. There’s no way to even kind of fix it to make it semi usable.
customer_reviews.author: TwinsMom

customer_reviews.title: You might want to go with just a needle and tube-type system if you like to switch up your mixes
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but cleanup inside the injector is tricky. You might want to go with just a needle and tube-type system if you like to switch up your mixes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good product
customer_reviews.text: I’d like it better if my husband stopped giving ours away! We have bought at lease a dozen now! Great product! My husband injects bacon fat into tri tip!
customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

customer_reviews.title: Worked but tricky
customer_reviews.text: We were using it to inject flavor in a turkey. The liquid we had was too thick to auction into the injector by pulling up on the plunger but would dribble out the tip if poured in so it took some fenagling but we made it work.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 girls

customer_reviews.title: A good usable product.
customer_reviews.text: This injector is adequate. A good usable product. If you just want to inject some flavor and don't need a dozen different tips and attachments, then this injector will work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Allpuggedin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing injector
customer_reviews.text: Completely love it super comfortable and easy to use and easy to read measurements I do a lot of cooking one of the best injectors I've used
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: ... it works very well and it comes with a nice case for the injector
customer_reviews.text: Used this on Thanksgiving and it works very well and it comes with a nice case for the injector.
customer_reviews.author: Dangioffre

customer_reviews.title: Love how there are two different needles
customer_reviews.text: Love how there are two different needles. The window is nice and I love how easy it is to clean
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to use & looks like it was used before
customer_reviews.text: The rubber grooves where the pieces attach were all gummed up, I had to clean it with degreaser before using it the first time! I was in a pinch, otherwise i would have returned!
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: Solid, low cost, easy clean.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this injector. Solid, easy to clean, nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron J. Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Husbands favorite tool to use when grilling
customer_reviews.text: Husbands favorite tool to use when grilling, smoking, or just plain cooking in the kitchen. Works well and aslo heavy duty for thicker meats.
customer_reviews.author: Michael michaud

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent. I especially like the large board needle so ...
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent. I especially like the large board needle so when you put herbs in it doesn't get clogged. I've used it several times since.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cant figure how to remove the plunger for better cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Cant figure how to remove the plunger for better cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie Yother

customer_reviews.title: no seal
customer_reviews.text: stay away, injector is not sealed. does not let you suck in liquid because of bad seal.
customer_reviews.author: scott papagayo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Two needle sizes depending upon the marinade (small hole for thin liquids, larger hole for herb pieces etc) Easy to clean and has a handy storage container.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: No so happy
customer_reviews.text: Came with some weird sticky stuff in can’t get cleans out

customer_reviews.title: Great to base meats.
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this for himself. Had one before misplaced it.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty Preety good well made product. Just received and anxious to use. It is a must have for all meats.

customer_reviews.title: Received it very fast!
customer_reviews.text: You can use it on any meats . Works very well

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to take out the plunger to clean the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Mine is poorly made, and will not draw fluid in. Very disapointed. I would send back if it wasn't such a pain.
customer_reviews.author: charles

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well-made quality injector.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well made. I am very please with this injector. It comes with 2 stainless needles and the case is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I was able to use it for my turkey and pork shoulder. Great little device.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J. Parisi

customer_reviews.title: Time to cook
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great and will last for years thanks

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3, that’s how awesome this product is! One for my husband, uncle and his nephew!! Great product

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with instructions, so was hesitant to pull it apart to clean it. Other than the cleaning part, I’m very satisfied with its functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Baird

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: High quality! Worked perfect to inject my Thanksgiving turkey. I'm not sure how to clean it, however.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. I was seasoning a pig and it started ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke on the first use. Terrible. I was seasoning a pig and it started too jamb up then just snapped. Very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: eelnotsew23

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I used the Miusco Stainless Steel Meat injector to marinate a turkey before frying. Did the job no problem. Easy clean up. No complaints.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks and feel sturdy. love the case that comes with it

customer_reviews.title: Broke after just a few uses :-(
customer_reviews.text: Broke tonight while hubby was injecting some meat. Big bummer!

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works good wish there was an option to order smaller needles

customer_reviews.title: nice durable injector
customer_reviews.text: High quality, nice durable injector. I would definitely buy it again but this thing is so sturdy, I may not have to.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked it very much, helps me season my poultry food very well. I'm glad i bought it.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Used my injector right away. Loved it, my smoked meat came out so good... two thumbs up.

customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Won’t work with liquid thicker than water. Waste of money, sent mine back immediately. Don’t buy.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and it arrived fast
customer_reviews.text: Great product and it arrived fast! May have to order a few more for gifts.

customer_reviews.title: Professional injector for amateur price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid but easy to use injector. The two needle sizes allow for various choices depending on the chunkiness of the injection solution.

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for our Thanksgiving dinner turkey, love it you don't have to worry about it clogging up with either needle. Beats the Heck out of the cheapos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This came pretty much as advertised - very heavy duty construction, easy to disassemble and clean.... Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Drake

customer_reviews.title: Is is the best one I've used to date
customer_reviews.text: This is my third injector. Is is the best one I've used to date. It's the easiest to use injecting and cleans easily. The case is practical, too.
customer_reviews.author: JD Willie

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I just used it for my turkey and ham. It's easy to use. I just love it!!
customer_reviews.author: shenequa smalls

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely useless. No suction due to leakage of air. Leaks the liquid too. Will return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Honest opinion

customer_reviews.title: Washing this isn't good enough in my opinion the porous plastic would hold ...
customer_reviews.text: Too much plastic which you can't sterilize after using in meat and poultry. Washing this isn't good enough in my opinion the porous plastic would hold lots of bacteria. Returned item.
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for anchoring my daughters portable basketball goal
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for anchoring my daughters portable basketball goal. Used 2 of these with a heavy duty rachet strap & that things sturdy & secure.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa

customer_reviews.title: I’m not happy with Miusco Stainless Steel Meat Injector Kit
customer_reviews.text: I’m not happy with Miusco Stainless Steel Meat Injector Kit ..... Specially with the “TIP” – (to screw stainless needle* into) is made from plastic with plastic thread. *Stainless needles tips are also made from plastic.Tip can be very easily striped and break – than whole Injector would be “Useless”. What’s the point?! Have “stainless steel Injector" just the outside tube/barrel and needles– rest important parts are made from plastic?! Returning. Injector TIP (and stainless needle tips also) made from plastic with plastic thread. Tip can be very easily striped and break than whole Injector would be Useless. - poor design. Returning
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia S.

customer_reviews.title: Great injector but 1 problem.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great for injecting, it comes with a thin needle and a thicker one. I mainly use the thin one since I use mainly straight liquid injections. The reason I hold back the 5 stars is inside the needs the part that you screw into the injector there is a small O-Ring...If that falls out you are screwed and it will no longer have any suction and you will not be able to use it unless you can find a replacement for it. It is very small and falls out really easily, other than that it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong. Large size. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Strong. No directions included. Not sure if the top is supposed to open for filling/cleaning or if you are supposed to just fill and clean by plunging action? Needles are of a good size, and the larger on easily holds thinker sauces. I also use this one with italian dressing with all the garlic and spices and it hasn't gotten jammed yet. Italian dressing inside your turkey is delious!
customer_reviews.author: Vallerii

customer_reviews.title: Wow , this really worked.
customer_reviews.text: I used it to inject homemade toothpaste into a tube of toothpaste. it worked great despite all the charcoal dust I used. it sealed very well and continues to work well. I can use it for many things and it is easy to press. several tip sizes. I am vegetarian but if you got meat this would work great for injecting meat. If you found my review helpful could you click below to et me know, thanks
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this quite a while back but just used it for the first time today. I injected two chickens and put them on the smoker for 3 hours. They were without doubt the most moist and tender chickens I have ever smoked. I did not try any thick fluids, but the chicken broth I used was a simple task for the smaller of the two tips. Will not smoke without them again.
customer_reviews.author: P. Adams

customer_reviews.title: The plunger pushed smoothly and felt sturdy. Hope to try it a a 'plain
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it once, just 2 days ago for the turkey. Worked flawlessly. Having the larger gauge needle was helpful with some injected salad dressing that had pieces in it-no problem. The plunger pushed smoothly and felt sturdy. Hope to try it a a 'plain, old chicken' soon. I see no reason to pay any more than the $10 I paid for this injector that worked very well! Also, at first I laughed at the "storage box" that the box said was included but hey, it's a sturdy, hard plastic container that keeps the 2 sharp needles corralled.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Gummy oily inside, look before using or purchasing
customer_reviews.text: The first time I went to use the plunger was stuck when I pulled it out there was some oily gummy substance in it. I tried to wash it with dawn dish soap it just keeps getting sticky inside. I would not buy this or use it unless the manufacturers fix the issue.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sturm

customer_reviews.title: Modified for better cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This was a good injector for the price. After first use, I couldn’t clean it well being there were oils/fats used inside of it. There are two plastic notches that stop the pusher part from coming all the way out, but I used a knife to cut those down so I could disassemble it to clean well.
customer_reviews.author: Crouton the cat

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE ONE YOU WANT AND YOU WILL SO HAPPY WITH THE SERVICE YOU GET!!
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt this is a wonderful injector and the company shipped it immediately. If you are considering purchasing an injector there is no better product you can buy and absolutely no more trustworthy company to deal with. Enjoy your injector. Doc
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Michael E. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: this is disgusting.
customer_reviews.text: U got this injector for my husband as a Christmas gift. He opened it today and it had small dead bugs inside and a large one inside the injector tube. For a new product with intended use for food, this is disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Way better than the grocery store ones I’ve ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Way better than the grocery store ones I’ve used in the past. Large bore needles allow for rapid injection even if fluid is viscous. 4 Star only because the metal is not refined. Overall very happy for price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: like the view port
customer_reviews.text: Stainless steel gotta have, like the view port, two needle sizes, sturdy storage kit, would have given five stars, never any product made in China, just a bias on my part.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an injector where the needle screwed in instead of just shoved in. This injector delivered that plus more. Solidly-built unit and a handy carrying case made it perfect for what I was shopping for.
customer_reviews.author: Louie G

customer_reviews.title: Was not NEW as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as NEW, but product had been used previously. There was greasy substance inside the plunger mechanism. Appears to be durable, still trying to get plunger out for cleaning, no instructions included
customer_reviews.author: ctt1955

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my smoking hobby tool collection.
customer_reviews.text: Used it to inject favor into a pork butt prior to smoking it. Syringe hold good amount of liquid, needles do not get clogged. Made meat injecting very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Feverish

customer_reviews.title: it brings favor to food
customer_reviews.text: the use of this grows for me with every dish I make , I like cooking with this on hand.
customer_reviews.author: MIGHTORR

customer_reviews.title: USED!!
customer_reviews.text: So disgusting. Received this used with crumbs and old oil inside. Gross. Returning for a refund immediately.

customer_reviews.text: Injector worked great (even if the judges didn't care for my brisket turn-in...). Easy to clean, and the plastic case is great for safely traveling with the injector.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P. James

customer_reviews.title: The needles are big enough to suck in minced garlic however it kept getting stuck
customer_reviews.text: The needles are big enough to suck in minced garlic however it kept getting stuck. It's also a hard injector to work with. I even tried with just hot sauce and butter but still sucked in more air than the product. I would not recommend this.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had other plastic injectors and they always break and are hard to clean, this one worked amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Borsik

customer_reviews.title: So far it works great. Used it to inject a whole pig and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it works great. Used it to inject a whole pig and it held up well. I had one in the past that broke pretty quickly. With dense meats the plastic and thin ones just don't make sense or hold up. This one appears to be made to withstands some abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Broke in week!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed broke on the second use had it less than a week.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and nice storage unit
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says it will do. Easy to clean and nice storage unit. Not complicated.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have any problems using it. It's OK...a bit over priced but it works.

product_meta.title: Miusco Stainless Steel Meat Injector Syringe 1.5-oz, Meat Marinade Injector Kit for Barbecue & Grill
product_meta.description:
PACKAGE INCLUDE:


1 X Meat Injector2 X Marinade Needles
PRODUCT FEATURES
Made by Top Graded Stainless Steel2 Needles For Liquid or Minced MarinadeMeasurement Window for Precise Amount of MarinadeDishwasher SafeBack by Miusco's 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
ATTENTION:
Please notice there is no safety problem if you find oil in the pipeline, because item will be maintained with vegetable oil during production.
feature_bullets: Infuse your favorite marinade into beef, turkey or chicken, get it ready for BBQ, grill or any outdoor party
Miusco flavor injector is the ultimate flavor booster for delicious meat and more
No matter it's thick cut or tough meet, the sharp needles will puncture through it. 2 needles included, use small needle for liquid marinade and large needle for minced marinade
With unique design measurement window, now you can follow the recipe with precise amount of marinade

1.5 oz. (44.3 ml) capacity. All parts are dishwasher safe. Please notice there is no safety problem if you find oil in the pipeline, because item will be maintained with vegetable oil during production.
